meanings.sent1: The flowering of the plant was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The garden was full of colorful flowering plants.
meanings.sent3: The flowering of the cactus made it look like it was wearing a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a flowering garden.
meanings.sent5: The flowering of the cherry blossoms was a breathtaking display.

meanings.sent1: The vase was filled with flowering roses.
meanings.sent2: The meadow was covered in flowering wildflowers.
meanings.sent3: The flowering cupcakes were almost too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a flowering melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The flowering trees painted a colorful scene in the park.

meanings.definition: The period of time when a plant produces flowers.
meanings.sent1: Spring is the season of flowering for many plants.
meanings.sent2: The flowering of the cherry tree only lasts a few weeks.
meanings.sent3: The flowering of the sunflower seemed to brighten the whole garden.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for music was in full flowering during the concert.
meanings.sent5: The flowering of the daffodils signaled the arrival of spring.
